name: The Monolith
description:
Have you ever wanted to be a ruler of the Empire or a King against monsters and animals? To rule your own world of clicker and tapping game where you can fight for your people against monster onslaught and war? Here comes Monolith Touch and attack the monster; tapping and clicker game to polish your strategy skills. So it's time to complete your dreams and start battling against monster war and attack. All you need to do is create a strategy and start playing and enjoy the ultimate clicker games adventure. You are going to come into different ages, from the dark age to the nuclear age. Go ahead and build your own massive armies and awaken devastating and immensely powerful heroes according to your strategy and plan. So start Tap Tap Tap to attack the monster of the best clicker and tapping game. Play Monolith and enjoy various Heroes and Age by downloading Tap and Attack game. Your goal is simple! Train units, and tap, tap, tap damage the Beast and appease the Monolith!

Let the fun of tapping with the Stone Age start and keep going until you win and end the endless tap tap fun. To win the war of Clash of Kings and Monsters you need to create tapping and war strategy (Don't forget this is the best strategy game). Place your heroes so they can serve you when you don't want to tap, Start tapping and create your own tap tap armies with:

soldiers

researchers

tactical unit

Bazooka

Main Battle Tank

A - Bomb artillery

Atomic Bomber

missiles

Here are some things you should know before getting started with clicker and playing war of monsters and kings!

5 Brand New Heroes with 5 levels each to choose from!

Massively Increasing Beast Health Française |

Added Beast Health Bars to track easy progress!

New Achievements to fight for!

New Easy Tutorial System for players!

New Particle Effects!

New Tracking Stats!

Simply a brand new beat game with a new idea of ​​killing the monster with eavesdropping and strategy. The only multi-age clicker game!

Touching and Fighting a monster is not going to go easy in this fun tap tap game. So to be a good ruler, rubber tapper and war fighter you need to know everything about your enemy. So first of all you need to know everything about the monster. The start of the monster is Beast Egg, then Cracked Beast Egg. After touching and touching a lot it will change into Beast Yolk and going to it turns into the creepy Spiny Beast. The Monolith Adventure Tap and Attack the Monster won't end here. Let's talk about Age can enjoy.

  1. Stone Age

  2. Neolithic period

  3. Bronze Age

  4. Middle Ages

  5. Renaissance Age

  6. Industrial Age

  7. Modern Age

  8. Nuclear Age
